data.actual_result: The client freezes, and you need to manually terminate the client. Additionally, the channel is no longer accessible until you turn off link previews in your user settings. (test with caution.)
data.expected_result: Discord gives up displaying the embed and doesn't embed it
data.short_description: Webpage with excessive strange Unicode characters in an embed crashes client
data.steps_to_repro: - Ensure link previews are on in the client - Link a page with excessive strange Unicode. A page this works with is http colon slash slash steamcommunity dot com slash groups slash cheatgiveaways (warning: this page will probably crash your web browser if you head to it)
